definitions.definition: A representative symbol , such as a trademark or logo .
examples: The medical trucks were emblazoned with the emblem of the Red Cross .

definitions.definition: Something that represents a larger whole.
examples: The rampant poverty in the ethnic slums was just an emblem of the group's disenfranchisement by the society as a whole.

definitions.definition: Inlay; inlaid or mosaic work; something ornamental inserted in a surface.
A picture accompanied with a motto , a set of verses , etc. intended as a moral lesson or meditation .
A picture placed on the field of the escutcheon .

main_definition: A representative symbol , such as a trademark or logo .
secondary_definitions: Something that represents a larger whole.
Inlay; inlaid or mosaic work; something ornamental inserted in a surface.
A picture accompanied with a motto , a set of verses , etc. intended as a moral lesson or meditation .
( heraldry ) A picture placed on the field of the escutcheon .
